desc: Kumu Farms established in 1980, operates on nearly 250 acres on Maui and Molokai. We produce Certified Organic and Conventional Produce for both the Hawaii and US Markets. Our featured product is our GMO Free Sunrise Papayas, available both organically and conventionally grown. At our Farm Markets try our artisan goods

layout.text:
Farm fresh Hawaiian produce & goods.
Available for local pickup & US Mainland shipping.
